text: Brian Johnson is an Australian curler. He is originally from Winnipeg, Manitoba. At the international level, he is a two-time curler (1992, 1993). ==Teams and events== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second ! scope="col"| Lead ! scope="col"| Alternate ! scope="col"| Events |- ! scope="row"| 1992–93 | Hugh Millikin || Tom Kidd || Gerald Chick || Brian Johnson || Neil Galbraith || (6th) |- ! scope="row"| 1993–94 | Hugh Millikin || Tom Kidd || Gerald Chick || Stephen Hewitt || Brian Johnson || (10th) |- ! scope="row"| 1994–95 | Hugh Millikin || Stephen Johns || Gerald Chick || Stephen Hewitt || Brian Johnson || (8th) |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Australian male curlers Category:Pacific-Asian curling champions Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Canadian emigrants to Australia Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg
title: Brian Johnson (curler)
